Minor: Business and the Liberal Arts Minor
Program_Policies: Students pursuing the Minor in Business and the Liberal Arts are encouraged to use ENGL 202D to satisfy their English 202 requirement. ECON 102 is a required prerequisite for some of the business courses.; A grade of C or better is required for all courses in the minor, as specified by Senate Policy 59-10. In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).

In addition, at least six credits of the minor must be unique from the prescribed courses required by a student's major(s).
